form_description: Form to record Dragline details for shift-wise production reports.

fields.description: The name of the subsidiary managing this report
fields.label: Name of Subsidiary
fields.name: subsidiary_name
fields.placeholder: Enter the name of the subsidiary

fields.description: The name of the mine where the report is being generated
fields.label: Name of the Mine
fields.name: mine_name
fields.placeholder: Enter the name of the mine

fields.description: The area for which the report is being generated
fields.label: Name of the Area
fields.name: area_name
fields.placeholder: Enter the name of the area

fields.description: The specific pit or patch covered in this report
fields.label: Name of the Pit/Patch
fields.name: pit_patch_name
fields.placeholder: Enter the name of the pit or patch

fields.description: The date for which the report is being prepared
fields.label: Date
fields.name: date

fields.description: The shift during which the report is applicable
fields.label: Shift
fields.name: shift

fields.label: Dragline Name / No.
fields.name: dragline_name_no
fields.placeholder: Enter the dragline name or number

fields.description: Bench number where the dragline is operating
fields.label: Bench No.
fields.name: dragline_bench_no

fields.description: Bucket capacity of the dragline in cubic meters
fields.label: Bucket Capacity (Cu.m.)
fields.name: bucket_capacity

fields.description: Average number of operating cycles per hour
fields.label: Avg. No. of Operating Cycles (Nos./Hr.)
fields.name: avg_operating_cycles
fields.placeholder: Enter average number of operating cycles per hour

fields.description: Solid overburden quantity in cubic meters
fields.label: Solid OB Quantity (Cum)
fields.name: solid_ob_quantity

fields.description: Rehandling overburden quantity in cubic meters
fields.label: Rehandling OB Quantity (Cum)
fields.name: rehandling_ob_quantity

fields.description: Total overburden quantity in cubic meters
fields.label: Total OB Quantity (Cum)
fields.name: total_ob_quantity
